alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Mitchell, western Jewell and southeastern Smith Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 830 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cawker City, or 15 miles northwest of Beloit, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ionia around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Esbon, Lebanon and Burr Oak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
